input.sentences: we went to the pool hall
man was proud of his shirt .
output.sentences: Our neighborhood pool hall is a fun place to visit.
My best friend, Manny, was on a winning streak before he lost the last game, and is now feeling sad.
I gave Manny a free raffle ticket, to try and cheer him up.
Finally, Manny won something and his frown turned upside down.
I loved taking this picture of him posing, so proud, with his new shirt.
